Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thank you for requesting your free solar consultation.
One of our solar experts will contact you within the next 48 hours to follow up on your request for a no obligation home solar site assessment. To get a jump start, gather your past 12 months of electricity usage (in kilowatt-hours) from your utility provider.
There has never been a better time to go solar. Direct Energy Solar offers cash purchase, monthly payment, and purchase financing options—we have an option to meet your specific needs. We hope to have the opportunity to help you go solar.
Let Direct Energy Solar help you understand your solar options. Download your free guide!
We’re pleased to offer you our downloadable guide which will help you better understand the benefits of going solar, financing options available, and the factors that influence the amount of your financial return. Plus, much more! Download your free copy of “Your Guide to Understanding Solar Power.” <http://pages.directenergysolar.com/rs/astrumsolarinc/images/DirectEnergySolar_UnderstandingSolarPower.pdf>
Hear from our satisfied customers.
